com.redhat.rhn.frontend.filter
Interface DepthAware

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelTreeNode, DepthAwareBean, VirtualSystemOverview
public interface DepthAware

Basically an interface user by the TreeFilter to ascertain the Depth of a DTO.. DepthAware

Method Summary
 long depth()
          Returns the depth of a given dto.
 

Method Detail

depth

long depth()
Returns the depth of a given dto. The depth value has to be >=0 with 0 being the root depth.

Returns:
the depth of a given DTO object in a tree.
